page.title: 03LEISURE
page.content: Different people spend their leisure time in lots of different ways.We visited{Mawgan}playing fields where lots of people spend their leisure time,for instance there are football facilities and a playground for the younger children. A pub is another place where people spend their leisure time,they often meet in the pub.We went to the{Ship {Inn}which is in{Mawgan}village Cornwall.We asked the landlord some questions on how he thought the pub should be run and he told us that running the pub doesn't give him much spare time but the spare time he does get he uses for walking the dogs as he has two Labradors and he walks them about six miles a day.He also told us that he doesn't think a pub should have many leisure things,as he thinks it is an old fashioned place for a
